price: (79) He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
